You’ve been thinking about this for a long time. You know what you need, and you’re ready to go for it. Take your place among the growing number of motivated students who’ve already joined the education evolution happening at CTU.

An Online College That Works For You

Accredited by the Higher Learning Commission (www.hlcommission.org), CTU offers a variety of learning options to new students, transfer students, working professionals, and active and retired military. At CTU's Colorado campuses in Aurora (Denver area) and Colorado Springs, or via the Internet in homes and offices around the world, A CTU education is designed around a busy life.
A Range of Degrees and a Strong Support System

We have more than 100 undergraduate and graduate degree programs and concentrations tailored to your interests and experience. Whether you want to pursue an associate degree, bachelor’s degree, master’s degree, or go the distance and earn your doctorate degree, CTU faculty and staff encourages and supports you along the way.

We select faculty with demonstrated experience, advanced degrees, and teaching qualifications to deliver industry-relevant education. Our instructors are focused on fostering student success and promoting an interactive student environment.
A Student Services Staff That Works for You

CTU Career Services are available to help to connect you with the career services you want — from career exploration, to company research, to finding an internship. For students who are ready to start their careers, we offer access to career coaches, résumé and cover letter writing, interview preparation, and professional networks.

CTU is able to assist you with the career searching services you want — from career exploration to company research.  For students who are ready to start their careers, CTU Student Success coaches can assist with resume and cover letters, interview preparation and networking strategies.

We want you to succeed and enjoy your journey with higher education. Take a look at our degree offerings and contact us with questions. We’re excited to help you with the next step along your career path.
Receive college credit for what you’ve already learned.
Save up to 30%, graduate up to 30% sooner.
Stay in the know when you’re on the go.
Live chats, discussion boards, archived lectures.
Pursue the education you want within the demands of your busy life. Our mobile tools are designed to help you keep up with classes, get homework done, and stay connected.
Use our award-winning online adaptive learning technology.
The IMS Global Learning Consortium, the world leader in EdTech interoperability and innovation, recognized CTU as a 2016 Gold Medal winner for its Virtual Classroom technology.
Military-friendly options designed for a busy lifestyle.
Our Military Education Benefits Specialists help you navigate your government education benefits and financial aid options.

Are you ready to connect with what matters most?

Pursuing your college education can be a life-changing choice, especially when you’re juggling the demands of work and life. But you’ve made the decision to go for it. It’s time to take control of your learning, grow your professional network and work to develop the knowledge you need to pursue your highest goals.
to CTU, and we’re here to help you through the process.

Whether you choose to pursue your degree at one of our traditional ground campuses or through our innovative, online learning platforms, we’re committed to your success. Start by choosing the admission scenario below that best fits your situation and
if you have questions along the way. We are here to help!

Our CTU Mobile App Makes It Convenient to Pursue Your Degree
CTU Mobile by Colorado Technical University received the 2016
Best of Elearning! Award of Excellence
CTU Mobile by Colorado Technical University™ is a
2016 International E-Learning Award (IELA) winner for mobile learning: academic division.
The IELA is an international organization that recognizes innovation in e-learning initiatives in the higher education and business industries.
named Colorado Technical University™ a 2016 Innovation Award winner for its mobile app, CTU Mobile, and creative use of technology to help improve student outcomes.
for CTU Mobile, recognized by WCET as technology-based solution shown to have impact on student success.
CTU Mobile – 2016 Appy Awards Finalist, Best App for Education
Colorado Technical University helps you pursue your degree from the palm of your hand. With our improved CTU Mobile App, you can:
Listen to Live Chats while folding laundry.
Send messages to faculty while your child plays at the park.
Review discussion boards while on your lunch break.
Add assignments to your calendar with the tap of a button.
Manage Your Progress On The Go
Stay Connected by Receiving Timely Notifications
Real-time push notifications for what matters most—discussion board replies, grades, changes to Live Chats, class meeting times, assignment due dates and more.

CTU Mobile App is one of the ways we are working to deliver a frictionless education to our students. We believe you should be able to access your work in ways that meet the demands of your busy lifestyle, and we strive to provide the flexibility and the freedom to work toward your academic goals on your time.

Colorado Technical University supports the philosophy that related courses, demonstrated proficiencies, and professional experience knowledge may be used to satisfy some course credit requirements. Credit granted for past experience, training, certification, and testing may reduce the time required to earn a degree. Transfer credit will be accepted upon evaluation and at the discretion of Colorado Technical University in all cases.
*Transfer credit is evaluated on an individual basis. Not all credits eligible to transfer. See the university's catalog for CTU's transfer credit policies.
Transfer students are invited to apply for admission at CTU.
To make the application process easier, review CTU's Transfer Student FAQs for further explanation of the process.
The following guide contains information about CTU's transfer credit policies and how we evaluate and apply previously earned credit.
CTU participates in a variety of federal and state financial aid programs that can assist students with educational expenses including tuition, books and housing.
